title: 高雅创作：如何报告武汉肺炎
contents:
via Twitter @badiucao


#HongKong newly releases an official illustration of where and how to report #WuhanPneumonia.
Everyone must remember it ：Keep calm and report to Popo.
香港特区正式出来 #武汉肺炎 报告方法，请大家务必广传！
#WuhanSARS #ChinaPneumonia
#FreedomHongKong
#SurealWork
